description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战辽沈战役期间，东北人民解放军对中华民国国军驻守的长春进行的一场围城战，最终以解放军占领长春告终，但围城期间造成大量平民饿死。
description.en: A siege during the Liaoshen Campaign of the Second Chinese Civil War, where the PLA surrounded KMT forces in Changchun. It resulted in a PLA victory but caused mass civilian starvation.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党与中国共产党之间在中国境内爆发的第二次内战。
description.en: The second civil war fought between the Kuomintang (KMT) and the Chinese Communist Party (CCP).

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战“三大战役”之一，长春围城是其组成部分。
description.en: One of the three major campaigns of the Second Chinese Civil War, of which the Siege of Changchun was a part.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在第二次国共内战时期的东北部队，长春围城的进攻方。
description.en: The PLA forces in Northeast China during the Second Chinese Civil War, the attacking force in the Siege of Changchun.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的国家军队，长春围城的防守方。
description.en: The national army of the Republic of China, the defending force in the Siege of Changchun.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国军在东北的最高指挥机构。
description.en: The supreme command of the KMT forces in Northeast China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，长春围城战役的前线指挥官。
description.en: A senior general of the PLA and the frontline commander of the Siege of Changchun.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国军将领，长春围城战役的国军最高指挥官。
description.en: A general of the National Revolutionary Army and the supreme commander of the KMT forces during the Siege of Changchun.

description.zh-cn: 原中华民国国军第六十军军长，在长春围城期间率部起义。
description.en: Former commander of the KMT's 60th Army, who defected with his troops during the Siege of Changchun.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国军新编第七军军长，在长春围城期间率部投降。
description.en: Commander of the KMT's New Seventh Army, who surrendered with his troops during the Siege of Changchun.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国主要领导人之一，时任东北人民解放军总司令，决定采取围困长春的战略。
description.en: A key leader of the CCP and PRC, commander of the Northeast People's Liberation Army who decided on the siege strategy for Changchun.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人，批准了围困长春的计划。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the CCP and PRC, who approved the plan to besiege Changchun.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治家及军事家，时任中华民国总统与国民党总裁，曾下令长春守军突围。
description.en: A statesman and military leader of the Republic of China, then President of the ROC and Director-General of the KMT, who ordered the Changchun garrison to break out.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国军将领，时任东北剿匪总司令部总司令。
description.en: A general of the National Revolutionary Army, then Commander-in-Chief of the Northeast Bandit Suppression Headquarters.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国主要领导人之一，曾亲自拟电报敦促郑洞国起义。
description.en: A key leader of the CCP and PRC, who personally drafted a telegram urging Zheng Dongguo to surrender.

description.zh-cn: 原属滇系部队的中华民国国军，由曾泽生指挥，在长春围城期间向解放军倒戈。
description.en: An KMT army originally from the Yunnan clique, commanded by Zeng Zesheng, which defected to the PLA during the Siege of Changchun.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国军部队，由李鸿指挥，在长春围城期间向解放军投降。
description.en: An KMT army commanded by Li Hong, which surrendered to the PLA during the Siege of Changchun.

description.zh-cn: 为固守长春而组建的国军部队，由郑洞国指挥。
description.en: The KMT army group formed to defend Changchun, commanded by Zheng Dongguo.

nodes.id: 第一兵团 (中国人民解放军)

zh-cn: 第一兵团 (中国人民解放军)

description.zh-cn: 为围困长春而组建的解放军部队，由萧劲光指挥。
description.en: The PLA army group formed to besiege Changchun, commanded by Xiao Jinguang.

description.zh-cn: 长春围城战的发生地，曾是满洲国首都，具有重要战略地位。
description.en: The location of the siege, former capital of Manchukuo, and a strategically important city.

description.zh-cn: 辽沈战役中的关键性战役，解放军攻占锦州切断了东北国军的陆路退路，对长春战局产生决定性影响。
description.en: A decisive battle in the Liaoshen Campaign. The PLA's capture of Jinzhou cut off the KMT's land retreat route from the Northeast, decisively impacting the situation in Changchun.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，长春围城战役的前线政委。
description.en: A senior general of the PLA and the frontline political commissar of the Siege of Changchun.

description.zh-cn: 长春围城是辽沈战役的组成部分。
description.en: The Siege of Changchun was part of the Liaoshen Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 辽沈战役是第二次国共内战中的三大战役之一。
description.en: The Liaoshen Campaign was one of the three major campaigns of the Second Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 在长春围城战役中，东北人民解放军作为进攻方与防守方中华民国国军对立。
description.en: During the Siege of Changchun, the Northeast People's Liberation Army (attacker) was in conflict with the Republic of China Armed Forces (defender).

relationships.target: 第一兵团 (中国人民解放军)
第一兵团 (中国人民解放军)

description.zh-cn: 萧劲光是长春围城的前线指挥官，服从于东北人民解放军总司令林彪的指挥。
description.en: Xiao Jinguang was the frontline commander of the siege, subordinate to Lin Biao, the commander of the Northeast People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 林彪作为东北野战军司令，其军事行动需得到中共中央军委主席毛泽东的批准。
description.en: As the commander of the Northeast Field Army, Lin Biao's military actions required the approval of Mao Zedong, Chairman of the CCP Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 林彪决定对长春采取围困方针，并下达了围困部署。
description.en: Lin Biao decided to adopt a siege strategy against Changchun and issued the deployment orders.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东批准了林彪对长春进行围困的部署。
description.en: Mao Zedong approved Lin Biao's plan to besiege Changchun.

description.zh-cn: 第一兵团是为固守长春而组建，隶属于东北剿匪总司令部。
description.en: The First Army Group was formed to defend Changchun and was subordinate to the Northeast Bandit Suppression Headquarters.

description.zh-cn: 郑洞国任东北剿匪总司令部副总司令，总司令为卫立煌。
description.en: Zheng Dongguo served as Deputy Commander of the Northeast Bandit Suppression Headquarters, under Commander-in-Chief Wei Lihuang.

description.zh-cn: 卫立煌由蒋介石任命为东北剿匪总司令部总司令。
description.en: Wei Lihuang was appointed by Chiang Kai-shek as the Commander-in-Chief of the Northeast Bandit Suppression Headquarters.

description.zh-cn: 锦州被解放军攻占后，东北国军陆路退路被切断，战场形势剧变，促使曾泽生下决心率部起义。
description.en: After the PLA captured Jinzhou, the KMT's land retreat route was cut off, drastically changing the battlefield situation and prompting Zeng Zesheng to defect with his troops.

description.zh-cn: 1948年10月17日，第六十军通电起义，倒向中国人民解放军。
description.en: On October 17, 1948, the 60th Army announced its uprising and defected to the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 第六十军的起义导致国军长春东半部防区瓦解，破坏了郑洞国的整体防御计划。
description.en: The defection of the 60th Army led to the collapse of the eastern defense sector of Changchun, disrupting Zheng Dongguo's overall defense plan.

description.zh-cn: 在第六十军起义后，新编第七军陷入孤立，最终与解放军商洽后放下武器投降。
description.en: After the defection of the 60th Army, the New Seventh Army was isolated and eventually negotiated with the PLA to lay down its arms and surrender.

description.zh-cn: 在下属部队相继起义和投降后，郑洞国最终被迫率兵团总部投降。
description.en: After his subordinate units defected or surrendered one after another, Zheng Dongguo was ultimately forced to surrender with his army group headquarters.

description.zh-cn: 周恩来亲自拟电报给郑洞国，以黄埔旧谊敦促他“起义”。
description.en: Zhou Enlai personally drafted a telegram to Zheng Dongguo, urging him to 'uprise' based on their old Whampoa friendship.

description.zh-cn: 长达五个月的军事围困和经济封锁导致长春市内粮食耗尽，大量平民因饥饿和疾病死亡。
description.en: The five-month military siege and economic blockade exhausted food supplies in Changchun, leading to the deaths of a large number of civilians from starvation and disease.
